trans-unit.source: Represents a class that manages the current instance of a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma classe que gere a instância atual de um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This class also provides the query interface over the current instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Esta classe fornece também a interface de consulta relativamente a instância atual do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: By using an instance of this class, you can make various queries on the StateMachineWorkflowInstance.
trans-unit.target: Ao utilizar uma instância desta classe, pode efetuar várias consultas no StateMachineWorkflowInstance.

trans-unit.source: Typical queries that can be made are as follows: - Current state of the state machine.
trans-unit.target: Consultas comuns que podem ser efetuadas são os seguintes: - atual estado da máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: - Possible transitions from the current state.
trans-unit.target: -Possíveis transições entre o estado atual.

trans-unit.source: - History of transitions for the state machine instance.
trans-unit.target: -Histórico de transições para a instância da máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: - Enumeration of all the states in the state machine.
trans-unit.target: -Enumeração de todos os Estados da máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The current workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Guid>indica que a instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: runtime is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: runtimeé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: or instanceId is an empty .
trans-unit.target: ou instanceId está vazio .

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently executing <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o atualmente em execução <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome da atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Posts a message to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Mensagens de uma mensagem para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue.
trans-unit.target: O nome da fila de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The object to queue.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de fila.

trans-unit.source: Posts a message to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Mensagens de uma mensagem para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue.
trans-unit.target: O nome da fila de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The object to queue.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de fila.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"></xref> that allows the sender to be notified when the item is delivered.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"> </xref> que permite que o remetente ser notificado quando o item é entregue.

trans-unit.source: An object to be passed to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"></xref> methods.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto transmitido para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"> </xref> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the current instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Guid>indica que a instância atual do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the current instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Guid>indica que a instância atual do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of state transitions that the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> can make.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um conjunto de transições de estado que atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> pode efetuar.

trans-unit.source: A collection of state transitions that the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> can make.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de estado passa que atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> pode efetuar.

trans-unit.source: Provides a transition to a specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> using the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma transição para uma determinada <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> utilizando o nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> to transition to.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> a transição para.

trans-unit.source: targetStateName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: targetStateNameé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The specified by targetStateName is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: O especificado pelo targetStateName é uma referência nula ().

trans-unit.source: Provides a transition to a specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma transição para uma determinada <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> to transition to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> a transição para.

trans-unit.source: targetState is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: targetStateé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of state activities that the state machine workflow instance has transitioned through.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de atividades de estado que a instância de fluxo de trabalho da máquina de estado transitou através de.

trans-unit.source: This property only returns the state history if the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> is used.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve apenas o histórico de estado se o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>é utilizado.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: An `InvalidOperationException` occurs if the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> is not installed.
trans-unit.target: Um `InvalidOperationException` ocorre se o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>não está instalado.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: If there is no state history for a newly created instance, state history is created without the instance being started.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum histórico de estado para uma instância criado recentemente, é criado o histórico de estado sem a instância a ser iniciada.

trans-unit.source: A collection of transitions that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> has made.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de passa que o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> efetuou.

trans-unit.source: Gets the latest definition of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a definição mais recente do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property only returns a copy of the workflow definition and never the live instance tree.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve apenas uma cópia da definição de fluxo de trabalho e nunca a árvore de instância em direto.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the activity tree that is returned by this property cannot be used to query for run-time values.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, a árvore de atividades que é devolvida por esta propriedade não é possível utilizar a consulta para os valores de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The latest definition of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A definição mais recente do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow has already completed, the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> cannot be retrieved, so the previous definition is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Se o fluxo de trabalho já foi concluída, atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> não é possível obter, pelo que a definição anterior é obtida.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> classes in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista dos <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> classes no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> classes in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> classes no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*> is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>é uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>.
